hero.title: Our Work Speaks for Itself
hero.subtitle: Portfolio of Excellence
hero.description: Explore our collection of successful projects that have transformed businesses and delighted users.

projects.title: FinTech Trading Platform
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade trading platform processing $2B+ in daily transactions.
projects.challenge: GlobalTrade needed a high-performance trading platform capable of handling millions of concurrent users with real-time data updates and zero downtime.
projects.solution: We built a microservices architecture using React for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and WebSocket for real-time communication. Deployed on AWS with auto-scaling and load balancing.

testimonial.text: Mikasasoft delivered beyond our expectations. The platform handles our peak loads flawlessly.
testimonial.author: John Davidson

projects.title: AI-Powered Health App
projects.shortDescription: Revolutionary healthcare app with AI diagnostics serving 500K+ patients.
projects.challenge: MediCare wanted to make quality healthcare accessible through a mobile app featuring AI-powered preliminary diagnostics and seamless provider connectivity.
projects.solution: Built a cross-platform mobile app with React Native, integrated TensorFlow for AI diagnostics, and Firebase for real-time data sync. HIPAA-compliant architecture.

projects.title: Luxury E-Commerce Platform
projects.shortDescription: Premium e-commerce with 3D visualization and AR try-on features.
projects.challenge: Prestige Brands needed a luxury shopping experience that showcased high-end products with immersive 3D and augmented reality features.
projects.solution: Developed with Next.js for performance, Three.js for 3D product visualization, and AR capabilities. Integrated with Shopify for inventory management.

projects.title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Real-time analytics platform processing millions of data points.
projects.challenge: DataViz Pro needed a powerful analytics platform capable of processing and visualizing massive datasets in real-time with interactive charts.
projects.solution: Built with React and D3.js for dynamic visualizations, GraphQL for efficient data queries, and MongoDB for flexible data storage. Optimized for performance.
